description:
Code Editor for your application, give the power to your users to view/edit code on a professional format in more than 80 programming languages. 

Demo : https://demo-codeeditor.bubbleapps.io/version-test

For any requests : https://joapp.ca/request
name: Code Editor (HTML, JS & many more)
plugin_instructions:
1. Add the code editor element to your page
2. Adjust parameters as you wish
3. Simply see what happen
